mapper.select: select * from initsign where courseId = #{courseId} and ((sightype = 2 and isEnd = 2) or (sightype = 1 and endtime <= #{endtime})) order by begtime desc
select * from initsign where courseId = #{courseId} and ((sightype = 2 and isEnd = 1) or (sightype = 1 and endtime > #{endtime}))
select count(*) from initsign where courseId = #{courseId} and ((sightype = 2 and isEnd = 1) or (sightype = 1 and endtime > #{endtime}))
select count(*) from initsign where courseId = #{courseId} and ((sightype = 2 and isEnd = 1) or (sightype = 1 and endtime > #{begtime}))
mapper.insert: insert into initsign(teacherId, courseId, begtime, endtime, teachlongitude, teachlatitude, sightype, isEnd) values (#{teacherId},#{courseId},#{begtime},#{endtime},#{teachlongitude},#{teachlatitude},#{sightype},#{isEnd})
